reviewText:
"Wow, the drug companies have their marketing people and thank God we have Dr. Steve on our side! His ideas are simple, easy to implement, and very effective! Dr. Steve's ideas fit into everybody's budget from those just starting out with small marketing budgets to those who can afford the bigger marketing ideas. If you have run out of, or you're just looking for some additional new patient ideas this is a must have book for you! Thank you Dr. Steve for your inspiration and effort."
- Dr. Jeffrey Garofalo (New Life Chiropractic, Bolingbrook, IL)
